Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Grand
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Grand due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Grand due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Consider using #20 Madison and #56 Milwaukee buses as an alternative to Blue Line rail service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute at 39th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via 39th, Kedzie, 38th, California, and 39th due to, street blockage near 39th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via 39th, Kedzie, 38th, California, and 39th due to, street blockage near 39th/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.
